0: 🤘 Jammin' with the 💻 console 🤠 cowboys in 🌐 cyberspace

/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.title: zitadel helm release
/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.name: zitadel
/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.doc: Zitadel is an identity management platform which has the best of Auth0 and Keycloack combined. It's built for the serverless era.

0:
[cyberpower-ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR"
  pollinterval = 10

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
